current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the provisions of title 46, United States Code, related to the Board of Visitors to the
			 United States Merchant Marine Academy, and for other purposes.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the
